The_Crypto_Kid GIFT FROM MoparMiningLLCBTCBITCOIN BLOCK NUMBER:  820,070  - winner Tibu block 820070: 000000000000000000029c170ca73ceee987202e850df5390b6676873260fb85 - 85 - no winnerblock 820071: 00000000000000000003a725b9db929191311b5d5c2ff5a7d3719f214a5a5bb5 - 55 - no winnerblock 820072: 000000000000000000025aa2dbb233376886c47c92c41ead2c5c34337e883f5c - 35 - apparent winner TibuArtwork Name:"Bitcoin Pizza Day 2022" Nr.5üé® Technique: Mixed technologiesDetails:Size: 15x19 Inch(together with frame)I decided to create a smaller artwork than usual. Instead of writing the story behind it, I believe this piece of art can speak for itself. As I envisioned the feelings of our guy Laszlo, who famously bought a pizza for 10,000 Bitcoin, I was inspired to create 'Bitcoin Pizza Day 2022.' It's a work that came to life hour by hour during my therapy sessions. ‚ÄîMX12Bitcointalk strong together ¬† ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚ÄîFeel Free to visit Mx12.Art Bitcoin Art Threadhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5362071.0‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äîor‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚ÄîSALE Threadhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5400193.msg60223973#msg60223973

Right now, I can happily go into the next year. ) I've run out of slots. comments.body: Thanks, mate, for assisting and helping me out. It was really fun to roll. I honestly thought that I would stay awake all night waiting for the winning number. Congratulations, Tibu! What a nice Christmas gift.
